QuestData.Title: The Path Forward
QuestData.Description: <Velen stares beyond the arena for a time.>$b$bWe must continue on, but I feel Eredath is far from finished with us. We should take advantage of this relative safety while we still can.$b$bI will place a signal beacon that will allow the Vindicaar to lock onto our location. Romuul will send us our means of returning to the Vindicaar if there is a need.
QuestData.RewardText: The way forward is clear, and we have the Army of the Light at our side.
